member.name: P:Spring.Context.Support.MvcApplicationContext.ConfigurationLocations
member.summary: An array of resource locations, referring to the XML object definition files that this context is to be built with.

remarks.p: Examples of the format of the various strings that would be returned by accessing this property can be found in the overview documentation of with the class.

member.returns: An array of resource locations, or if none.

member.name: P:Spring.Context.Support.MvcApplicationContext.ConfigurationResources
member.summary: An array of resources that this context is to be built with.

remarks.p: Examples of the format of the various strings that would be returned by accessing this property can be found in the overview documentation of with the class.

member.returns: An array of s, or if none.

member.summary:

You must override this method in a derived class to control the manner in which the is registered.
